name: @aragon/kits-bare
description: Generic kit for deploying and setting up a DAO with one app
author: Aragon Association <legal@aragon.org>

scripts.publish:rpc: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:rpc | tail -n 1) --environment default
scripts.deploy:kit:rpc: aragon contracts compile --all && aragon contracts exec --network rpc scripts/deploy.js
scripts.publish:staging: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:rinkeby | tail -n 1) --environment staging
scripts.publish:rinkeby: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:rinkeby | tail -n 1) --environment rinkeby
scripts.deploy:kit:rinkeby: aragon contracts compile --all && aragon contracts exec --network rinkeby scripts/deploy.js
scripts.publish:mainnet: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:mainnet | tail -n 1) --environment mainnet
scripts.deploy:kit:mainnet: aragon contracts compile --all && aragon contracts exec --network mainnet scripts/deploy.js
